name: Highlandur
description:
* THIS IS A SUBMISSION FOR THE GMTK GAME JAM 2019 *

ONLY ONE

Only one can survive this deadly arena. Hundred merciless chickens and vengeful bunnies are coming for your head! The only sword in the game will offer you protection!

Gameplay explanation:

Use W,A,S,D or the ARROW keys for movement. Press left mouse button to charge your bow and shoot. If you've gotten the sword you can deflect arrows and even charge your sword for a larger attack radius!

There can be only one left!

Credits:

Title Music: Salty Ditty Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
